definition: bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

bubble/foam/blister (i.e. skin bubble)/to soak/to steep/to infuse/to dawdle/to shilly-shally/to hang about/to pick up (a girl)/to get off with (a sexual partner)/classifier for occurrences of an action/classifier for number of infusions
puffed/swollen/spongy/small lake (esp. in place names)/classifier for urine or feces

sentences.english: I am not talking to you. I am chewing bubblegum.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有和你說話，我在嚼泡泡糖。

sentences.english: Merkel is as soft as chewed bubble gum. Pathetic woman.
sentences.chinese: 默克爾就像嚼過的泡泡糖一樣軟，可憐的女人。

sentences.english: ” “An interviewee took his bubble gum out of his mouth and held it in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 一個應試者把泡泡糖從嘴裏拿出來攥在手裏。

sentences.english: Bubble gum or a chocolate pie?
sentences.chinese: 買泡泡糖還是一塊巧克力派？

sentences.english: One day, I managed to gather up ninety-seven cents worth of bubble gum.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，我估計着拿了七十七美分的泡泡糖。

sentences.english: I love you more than bubble gum.
sentences.chinese: 我愛你甚至超過愛泡泡糖。

sentences.english: By then, he was chewing a fancily wrapped bubble gum.
sentences.chinese: 他喫的是那種用白臘紙包着的長條形泡泡糖。

sentences.english: Patrick wishes for chewing gum for himself and the characters ended up eaten.
sentences.chinese: 派大星許願讓自己變成泡泡糖，最終所有人被喫掉。

sentences.english: This CD is pure bubblegum pop.
sentences.chinese: 這張CD純粹是“泡泡糖”流行音樂。

sentences.english: I always just assumed that you listened to bubblegum pop.
sentences.chinese: 我只是想你聽聽泡泡糖搖滾舞曲。

sentences.english: He never got his picture on bubble gum cards, did he?
sentences.chinese: 他的照片，泡泡糖卡片上從來沒印過，對嗎？

sentences.english: Don t build junk; don t bubble gum or duck tape the code.
sentences.chinese: 唐建噸垃圾，不噸泡泡糖或鴨磁帶的代碼。

definition: soft candy (gummi candy, gumdrop, jellybean etc)
Mentos, a brand of candy produced by European company Perfetti Van Melle
